resources.string: To get started we\'ll need you to answer a few questions about yourself.

string-array.name: questions_toggle
string-array.item: Do you feel drowsy and unable focus regularly?
Do you consume more than 50 grams of sugar a day?

string-array.name: questions_user_input
string-array.item: How many hours of daily sunlight do you get on average?
How many ounces of daily vegetables do you consume on average?
How many grams of protein do you consume on average in a day?
